meanings.sent1: The scientist used a photomicrographic technique to capture tiny details.
meanings.sent2: The photomicrographic image revealed hidden structures within the cell.
meanings.sent3: The photomicrographic process made the small objects look larger than life.
meanings.sent4: Her photomicrographic skills allowed her to see the world in a whole new light.
meanings.sent5: The photomicrographic examination uncovered intricate patterns invisible to the naked eye.

meanings.definition: A photograph taken through a microscope.
meanings.sent1: The photomicrographic showed the intricate details of the specimen.
meanings.sent2: She captured the tiny world through a photomicrographic lens.
meanings.sent3: The photomicrographic displayed a miniature universe under the lens.
meanings.sent4: In the photomicrographic, the cells resembled a bustling cityscape.
meanings.sent5: The photomicrographic revealed a hidden world teeming with life.
